title: Struggle for Pedder
brief_description: Beginning with an aggressive argument in favour of flooding Lake Pedder this film, supporting the conservation of the lake, shows through the eyes of a photographer, botanist, artist, zoologist, poet and others, something of the beauty and interest residing in the lake and its surroundings.
